techmeme.title: DeepSeek R1 is more susceptible to jailbreaking than ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude; it can instruct on a bioweapon attack, write a pro-Hitler manifesto, and more (Sam Schechner/Wall Street Journal)
In January, Elon Musk said he had "not put in a bid for TikTok" and wasn't "chomping at the bit to acquire" it, amid reports of China evaluating the possibility (Shelly Banjo/Bloomberg)
TikTok advises its US Android users to sideload the app through APKs on its website; its app still isn't back in Apple's App Store and Google Play in the US (Mariella Moon/Engadget)
How Sam Altman outflanked Elon Musk to win over Donald Trump, including by telling Trump in a phone call that the tech industry will achieve AGI during his term (New York Times)
Tests show DeepSeek's chatbot sometimes hallucinates cited URLs and often admits that sharing news articles' content could violate copyright and skirt paywalls (Andrew Deck/Nieman Lab)
